'''"Let the Arataki Gang Show Begin!"''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 2.3]].

==Event Duration==
2021/12/09 12:00 – 2021/12/13 23:59 (UTC+8)

==Eligibility==
[[Adventure Rank]] 10 or above

==Event Summary==
During the event, Travelers will need to complete the designated event tasks as well as help Arataki Itto set up the theater. Upon completion, you will receive in-game items as rewards.

==Gameplay Details==
# During the event, Travelers will need to complete the designated event tasks as well as help Arataki Itto set up for the show. Upon completion, you will receive in-game items as rewards.
# After each stage of the theater is complete, share the picture that you have just obtained for the first time to receive in-game items as rewards. During the event, you can obtain a total of three in-game items for sharing the pictures.

===Assembly Information===
# During the event, Travelers who participate in Act III can click on the invite button on the top-right corner to get the link to the event and the invitation code. They can then share it with other Travelers to form a group to watch the performance together.
# Travelers who receive the invitation need to click on the link shared by others to enter the event and enter the invitation code to join your group.
# Travelers can form groups via the random matching method. The "Find random players" button will light up after the countdown shown in the pop-up window ends.
# Once the group is formed (three people in total), each member will receive additional in-game rewards. Don't forget to collect them.

==In-Game Rewards==
# Help Arataki Itto with the preparations for the performance and share the pictures to obtain Primogems, Character Ascension Materials for Arataki Itto, and other in-game rewards. During the event, you can get up to three in-game rewards.
# Invite two friends to join your group to watch the performance for extra in-game rewards.
:* {{Card|Mora|20,000}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|2}}

==Notes==
# Please log in to the event using your miHoYo Account and select your corresponding character in Genshin Impact to take part. This will ensure that your rewards can be sent and claimed correctly.
# The obtained pictures will be collected in the album, which can be viewed repeatedly during the event.
# You will need to manually collect additional in-game rewards obtained from joining a group. Don't forget to check your party configuration and collect your rewards.
# The in-game rewards obtained for sharing the pictures will be distributed via in-game mail. The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.
